entry.title: Install MLOps Profile with Weave GitOps
entry.summary: “Profiles” is a GitOps-native package management system, which allows you to apply a Profile to add a set of capabilities to your GitOps-enabled cluster. Here’s a quick tutorial on how to provision a cluster, install Weave GitOps and apply the MLOps profile to enable Kubeflow Pipeline for your cluster. To try this setup, we strongly recommend that you use Kind as a local cluster on your laptop.
